title: SkinPreview
body:
Hello Summoners,
Can I get a ban for using Skin preview?

replies.body: We may not be banning for it now, but we don't support the use of third party programs.  Selecting to puts you at risk if there's any malicious content hiding inside, and we couldn't offer any support for it.  Check out our[ third party guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/225266848) for more info, and stay cautious!
